m_szDocSumamry: You are here: Home » You may also like » Cactus-inspired skin to boost electric cars Cactus-inspired skin to boost electric cars Melbourne, May 1, 2016 (PTI)  Inspired by the humble cactus, scientists have developed a new type of membrane that has the potential to significantly boost the performance of fuel cells and transform the electric vehicle industry. In hot conditions the membrane, which features a water repellent skin, can improve the efficiency of fuel cells by a factor of four, researchers said.
